Class TAController

java.lang.Object

public class TAController
extends Object
implements SceneManager.Controller<TA>, javafx.fxml.Initializable

  • Method Details

    • addTimeUnavailable

      public void addTimeUnavailable​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Validates the current time unavailable fields. If valid then it adds the TimeUnavailable to the TA's unavailable list.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered this method.

    • cancel

      public void cancel​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Cancels creating/editing TA and returns to dashboard scene.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered this method.
      See Also:
      SceneManager

    • saveTAInfo

      public void saveTAInfo​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Validates TA fields. If valid then either saves the the new TA or updates the TA being edited.
      Parameters:
      event - The event that triggered this method.

    • validate

      private boolean validate()
      Validates the TA info fields.
      Returns:
      True if the TA is valid.

    • validateTimeUnavailable

      private boolean validateTimeUnavailable()
      Validates the time unavailable fields.
      Returns:
      True if valid.

    • initData

      public void initData​(TA ta)
      Initializes data for the taInfo scene.
      Specified by:
      initData in interface SceneManager.Controller<TA>
      Parameters:
      ta - The TA being edited. Should be null if creating a new TA.

    • initialize

      public void initialize​(URL location, ResourceBundle resources)
      Setups up any fields or tables that are included in the scene.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable

    • clearCurrentTimeBlockEntry

      public void clearCurrentTimeBlockEntry()
      Clear the time unavailable fields.
